replies.body:
Why do you steal my Idea? :D

Time Zone: [What is your timezone?]
Experience?: [List all your experiences as a staff member on other Minecraft servers, or alternatively leadership experiences]   
Why do you believe you should be a moderator for Avicus?: [Write a detailed paragraph explaining why you believe you deserve a staff position.]   
How would you benefit the Avicus staff team?: [Write a detailed paragraph explaining why you believe you would benefit the Avicus Staff Team.]  

If a player is using a hacked client on the server what in your opinion would be the most appropriate punishment?: [Justify which punishment you believe the player should be given.]

If a player is swearing and being abusive on the server what in your opinion would be the most appropriate punishment?:[Justify which punishment you believe the player should be given.]  

If a player is team griefing or team spleefing on the server what in your opinion would be the most appropriate punishment?: [Justify which punishment you believe the player should be given.]  

Do you have the ability to record video? [Yes or No]  
Do you own a microphone and have access to TeamSpeak 3 and Skype?: [Yes or No]   

:D
